title: Origin Universe? (Part 3)
body:
Origin Universe? (Part 3)

(The third effect of your title 'RULE BREAKER' is activated)

(The laws of this universe won't be able to harm you because of your title Rule Breaker)

--) Effects of your title -

1. You can enter the tower of ascension after reaching A rank.

2. All the rules of the dungeons are ineffective against you.

3. Only the laws of the Origin Universe can affect you.

Evan already knew about the first two effects of his title so he immediately read about the third effect.

But when he read about the third effect, a look of confusion appeared on his face.

"What is this Origin Universe now?" he never heard anything about Origin Universe so Evan looked at the third effect with a face full of confusion.

But suddenly he looked at the first effect and then at the third effect of his title.
